name: Ashley The Captain
description:
**Best Superhero Game in the store! ***

Ready! Set! Go! Ready your shield and hover board and hover your way to this mega epic adventure! This Female Captain in the USA will not stop for anything! She will jump and hover her way towards victory.

Rush towards the base of the evil soldiers and defeat them. Overcome all the obstacles, beat every level and finish your mission.

Features:
- Incredible Fun, sporty gameplay that will make you ask for more
- Different characters to choose from
-Very easy to play; just tap your screen to jump
- A lot of exciting obstacles and levels to conquer
- Shooting enemies made easy with its easy to play
